title: In-Chat Image Display Test
body_html:
In-Chat Image Display Test

Request: Test the ability to display images within the chat interface.

Process:

Pansil (Task Coordinator):

  1. Received a request from the user to test image display.
  2. Asked the Websearch agent for a sample image URL.
  3. Received the URL (https://picsum.photos/200/300) from the Websearch agent. This URL did not work.
  4. Requested a random, visually appealing image.
  5. Received the URL (https://source.unsplash.com/random) from the Websearch agent. This URL did not load in the chat.
  6. Used markdown ![Test Image](https://picsum.photos/200/300) within the send_message function to display the image in the chat.
  7. Requested a direct link to an Unsplash image.
  8. Received a direct link from the Websearch agent.
  9. Used markdown to display the image in chat.

Websearch Agent:

  1. Received a request from Pansil for a sample image URL.
  2. Formulated the search query "sample image URL".
  3. Used the search_searxng tool to search the web.
  4. Analyzed the search results and identified Lorem Picsum as a suitable source.
  5. Provided the URL https://picsum.photos/200/300. This URL did not work
  6. Received a request for a random, visually appealing image.
  7. Suggested Unsplash and provided the URL https://source.unsplash.com/random
  8. Received a request for a direct link to an Unsplash image.
  9. Browsed Unsplash and provided a direct link: https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618005212471-44d8f4303a54?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8c2NlbmVyeXxlbnwwfHwwfHw%3D&w=1000&q=80

Outcome: The initial image URLs did not load. The Unsplash URL (https://source.unsplash.com/random) did not load because it is a redirect. A direct link to an Unsplash image loaded correctly.

Unsplash random URL (did not load): https://source.unsplash.com/random Direct Unsplash URL (loaded): https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618005212471-44d8f4303a54?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8c2NlbmVyeXxlbnwwfHwwfHw%3D&w=1000&q=80
